content.query:
-- School level Enrollment

IF EXISTS (
    SELECT 1
    FROM sys.tables
    WHERE name = 'EnrollmentSchool' AND schema_id = SCHEMA_ID('transform')
)
BEGIN
    EXEC('DROP TABLE transform.EnrollmentSchool')
END

SELECT [SchoolYear]
      ,[OrganizationLevel]
      ,[County]
      ,[ESDName]
      ,[ESDOrganizationID]
	  ,[SchoolCode]
	  ,[SchoolName]
      ,[DistrictCode]
      ,[DistrictName]
      ,[DistrictOrganizationId]
      ,[SchoolOrganizationid]
      ,[CurrentSchoolType]
      ,[GradeLevel]
      ,d.[StudentGroup]
      ,[StudentGroupCategory]
      ,[StudentGroupType]
      ,[Enrollment]
Into transform.EnrollmentSchool
FROM (
    SELECT [SchoolYear]
          ,[OrganizationLevel]
          ,[County]
          ,[ESDName]
          ,[ESDOrganizationID]
          ,coalesce([Local District Code], case when len(a.[DistrictCode])<5 
				then '0' + a.[DistrictCode]
				else a.[DistrictCode] 
				end) as [DistrictCode]
		  ,COALESCE(c.[Local District], a.[DistrictName]) AS [DistrictName]
          ,[DistrictOrganizationId]
          ,[SchoolCode]
		  ,COALESCE([School Name], [SchoolName]) AS [SchoolName]
          ,[SchoolOrganizationid]
          ,[CurrentSchoolType]
		  ,b.[GradeLevel] as [GradeLevel]
          ,[All Students]
          ,[Female]
          ,[Male]
          ,[Gender X]
          ,[American Indian/ Alaskan Native]
          ,[Asian]
          ,[Black/ African American]
          ,[Hispanic/ Latino of any race(s)]
          ,[Native Hawaiian/ Other Pacific Islander]
          ,[Two or More Races]
          ,[White]
          ,[English Language Learners]
          ,[Highly Capable]
          ,[Homeless]
          ,[Low-Income]
          ,[Migrant]
          ,[Military Parent]
          ,[Mobile]
          ,[Section 504]
          ,[Students with Disabilities]
FROM [staging].[Enrollment] a
	LEFT JOIN dim.GradeLevel b ON a.GradeLevel = b.GradeLevelKey
	LEFT JOIN staging.CharterSchoolDirectory c ON a.SchoolCode = c.[School Code]
) AS src
UNPIVOT (
    Enrollment FOR StudentGroup IN (
        [All Students]
        ,[Female]
        ,[Male]
        ,[Gender X]
        ,[American Indian/ Alaskan Native]
        ,[Asian]
        ,[Black/ African American]
        ,[Hispanic/ Latino of any race(s)]
        ,[Native Hawaiian/ Other Pacific Islander]
        ,[Two or More Races]
        ,[White]
        ,[English Language Learners]
        ,[Highly Capable]
        ,[Homeless]
        ,[Low-Income]
        ,[Migrant]
        ,[Military Parent]
        ,[Mobile]
        ,[Section 504]
        ,[Students with Disabilities]
    )
) AS unpvt
left join [dim].[StudentGroup] d on unpvt.StudentGroup = d.StudentGroup
WHERE d.StudentGroup NOT LIKE 'Non%' and [OrganizationLevel] = 'School'
